page.title: 04FARMING DOWNLAND MINAL
page.content: The five farms, the lands of which lie in or partly in the area, range in sze from 140 to 1200 acres. 1. Stock Close Farm and 2. Mere Farm are praivately owned. 3. Bytham Farm is owned and run as a family partnership. 4. Woodlands and minal warren Farms are run jointly as a Limited Company, and 5. Wararean Farm, once Sparrowgate, is a business partnership. The total acreage of the five farms is about 3200acres. In 1986:- Total Acreage: Mixed arable 1880 acres about 57% Grassland 1300acres about 32% Woodland 336 acres about 11% On the south, east and west sides of the area are stretches of land belonging to farms centred outside it, and not included in the analysis.
